BBEX3.A.GNF.USD.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Guinea / USD 1 = GNF ... (buying)
Source: Since 2006: Banque Internationale pour le Commerce et L`Industrie de la Guinee, Conakry. 1990 - 2005: Banque Centrale de la Republique de Guinee, Conakry.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.

Comment on 2004: On 2 July 2004, the Guinean franc was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate).  1 July 2004: USD 1 = GNF 1,990.00 / 2,010.00  14 July 2004: USD 1 = GNF 2,487,50 / 2,512,50.  Calculated devaluation: 20.0%.
